column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I've been to many of the world's best art museums from the Louvre and Musée D'Orsay (still my all time favorite) in Paris to the Uffizi in Florence
column2: the Metropolitan and MoMA in NYC
column7: the National in Taipei and so many more. You would think that with that much cultural stimulation I'd be a lot more refined. But I digress.
